ukufunda koomatshini: Ii-algorithms ezenza ukuba iikhompyuter zifunde kwidatha
ukufunda okunzulu: Isebenzisa uthungelwano lwe-neural olunemigangatho emininzi kwimisebenzi entsonkothileyo
nlp: Ivumela iikhompyutha ukuba ziqonde kwaye zisebenze ulwimi lwabantu
umbono wekhompyuter: Ivumela iikhompyutha ukuba 'zibone' kwaye zitolike ulwazi olubonwayo
ukufunda okomeleza: Ukufunda ngokulingwa kunye nempazamo ngemivuzo kunye nezohlwayo
imfundo ebekwe esweni: Ukufunda kwidatha eelebhile kunye neeperi-output pairs
ukufunda okungajongwanga: Ukufumana iipateni kwidatha ngaphandle kweelebhile ezichazwe kwangaphambili
Imayini yedatha: Ukufumana iipateni kwiiseti zedatha ezinkulu nezintsonkothileyo
inkqubo yeengcali: Ilinganisa isakhono sokuthatha isigqibo sengcali engumntu
ukukhangela algorithm: Uphonononga ngobuchule indawo yengxaki ukufumana isisombululo
ukumelwa kolwazi: Indlela ulwazi olucwangciswa ngayo kwaye lugcinwe kwiinkqubo ze-AI
iirobhothi: Intsimi ejongene noyilo, ukwakhiwa, kunye nokusetyenziswa kweerobhothi
agi: I-hypothetical AI enobukrelekrele benqanaba lomntu kwimisebenzi emininzi
i-algorithm yemfuzo: Ukukhangela ubuchule obuphefumlelwe yinkqubo yendalo yendalo
umthi wesigqibo: Imodeli efana nomthi yokuhlela idatha ngokusekelwe kwiimpawu
umatshini we-vector wokuxhasa: I-algorithm yokufumana umgca okanye i-hyperplane eyahlula kakuhle idatha
inethiwekhi yaseBayesian: Imodeli enokwenzeka emele ubudlelwane phakathi kwezinto eziguquguqukayo
ukuveliswa kolwimi lwendalo: Ukuvelisa isicatshulwa esifana nomntu kwidatha eyakhiweyo
uhlalutyo lweemvakalelo: Ukumisela ithoni yeemvakalelo okanye injongo emva kwesiqwengana sesicatshulwa
ukuqondwa kobuso: Itekhnoloji yebhayometriki echonga abantu ngeempawu zobuso
isithuthi esizimeleyo: Izithuthi ezinokuva okusingqongileyo kwaye zihambe ngaphandle kwegalelo lomntu
uguqulelo lomatshini: Uguqulelo oluzenzekelayo lombhalo ukusuka kolunye ulwimi ukuya kolunye
inkqubo yokucebisa: Iqikelela ukhetho lomsebenzisi ukucebisa izinto okanye umxholo
umchasi umzekelo: Igalelo eliyilelwe ukukhohlisa imodeli yokufunda yomatshini
ukudlulisela ukufunda: Ukusebenzisa kwakhona ulwazi olusuka kumsebenzi othile ukuphucula ukufunda komnye
imodeli yokuvelisa: Imodeli ye-AI ekwaziyo ukudala idatha entsha efana neseti yoqeqesho lwayo
I-AI yomfuziselo: I-AI esekwe kwiisimboli ezikhohlisayo kunye nemithetho (thelekisa kunye neenethiwekhi ze-neural)
inkqubo yee-arhente ezininzi: Ukuqokelelwa kwee-arhente ze-AI ezisebenzisanayo kwindawo ekwabelwana ngayo
inkqubo enokwenzeka: Ukusebenzisa iilwimi zokucwangcisa ukuchaza imifuziselo enokwenzeka
i-neuromorphic computing: I-Hardware eyilelwe ukulinganisa umsebenzi we-biological neurons
